section.section: The Governor's Workforce Investment Board shall provide staff for the advisory committee.

text.section: On or before June 1 of each year, the Governor's Workforce Investment Board shall submit a report on its findings and recommendations to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, to the Senate Education, Health, and Environmental Affairs Committee and the House Committee on Ways and Means on the implementation of this subtitle.
